name: Must Finish Tonight! (Prototype)
description:
Jump and evade to stay alive while trying to finish your game! Pay attention to hazards: look all around, not just on your screen! But you gotta look at your screen because that's where your work is - programming, drawing and submitting your finished work!

All hazards announce themselves with sound and visuals - watch out for cues to get away from your computer and dodge. Don't forget you can hold "up" to jump higher.

This is a game I made for a small jam in 3 days.

The game is short, but very challenging. My fastest time is 1:57.014. Can you beat it?
